title: Clinical Trial Enrollment
verified_action_description: Report encounter: medications given, adverse events, request investigator callback; initiates chargeback/reimbursement claim
not_verified_action_description: Call emergency number on card to report suspicious document or confirm enrollment verbally
notes: Authentication gap: anyone who sees card can POST; mitigated by human triage and audit trails

title: Building Inspector Badges
verified_action_description: Record verified badge number, timestamp, and areas accessed for compliance and liability
not_verified_action_description: Report potential impersonation; do not allow entry; request supervisor callback from issuing agency
notes: Suspended/Alert status should trigger same response as not-verified

title: Attorney Good Standing
verified_action_description: Court can accept Pro Hac Vice motion; client can sign retainer; bank can open trust account
not_verified_action_description: Report potential unauthorized practice of law; do not proceed with legal engagement
notes: Suspended status: may still hold valid credential but cannot practice

title: Healthcare Worker Credentials
verified_action_description: Document that provider credentials were verified before treatment; audit trail for malpractice defense
not_verified_action_description: Escalate to security and nursing supervisor; do not allow unsupervised patient access
notes: See LLM.md verification-meta.json for abuse protection and progressive guidance

title: Law Enforcement Credentials
verified_action_description: Verification confirms authority; proceed with traffic stop, warrant service, etc.
not_verified_action_description: Ask for badge number and supervisor; call local dispatch to confirm officer identity
notes: Legitimate officers should welcome verification; resistance is a red flag

title: Professional Licenses
verified_action_description: Proceed with employment, contract, or service engagement with confidence
not_verified_action_description: Ask for issuing board contact; verify directly with licensing authority before engagement

title: Insurance Policy Documents
verified_action_description: Submit claim details directly; policy number pre-filled; faster than calling 800 number
not_verified_action_description: Call customer service to verify coverage before proceeding with treatment or repair
notes: POST form can include: claim type

title: Product Authenticity
verified_action_description: Optional: register product for warranty; report where/when purchased to help brand track distribution
not_verified_action_description: Submit counterfeit report form: where purchased, photos, batch codes; helps brand and customs enforcement

title: Vehicle Inspection Certificates
verified_action_description: Verification confirms vehicle passed inspection; no further action needed
not_verified_action_description: File complaint with DMV or state inspection authority; station may be issuing fake passes
notes: Emissions fraud is common; verification protects buyers of used vehicles

title: Food Safety Certifications
verified_action_description: Restaurant/facility has valid health certification; no action needed
not_verified_action_description: File complaint with local health authority; request inspection
notes: Protects diners from fake Grade A certificates

title: Academic Credentials
verified_action_description: Degree verified; proceed with job offer or graduate school admission
not_verified_action_description: Contact registrar directly; do not proceed with employment based on unverified degree
notes: Diploma mills are common; verification protects employers

title: Controlled Substance Prescriptions
verified_action_description: Pharmacist can fill prescription with confidence; log in PDMP
not_verified_action_description: Do not fill; contact prescribing physician to verify; report to state pharmacy board if suspicious
notes: Prevents doctor shopping and forged prescriptions

title: Notarized Documents
verified_action_description: Court clerk or recording office can accept document; notary seal verified
not_verified_action_description: Refuse to record; report to Secretary of State notary division for investigation

title: Court Orders and Judgments
verified_action_description: Sheriff/marshal can proceed with eviction, garnishment, asset seizure
not_verified_action_description: Do not execute potentially forged order; contact issuing court clerk to verify
notes: Prevents enforcement of fake restraining orders

title: Work Authorization Documents
verified_action_description: Employer can document work authorization compliance; proceed with hiring
not_verified_action_description: Ask for different List A/B/C documents; do not hire based solely on unverified document
notes: E-Verify integration possible but not required

title: Power of Attorney Documents
verified_action_description: Bank, hospital, or institution can allow agent to act on principal's behalf
not_verified_action_description: Do not allow transactions; require principal to appear or provide fresh POA
notes: POA fraud is common in elder abuse cases

title: Medical Device Certifications
verified_action_description: Surgeon can proceed; device provenance verified; useful for recall tracking
not_verified_action_description: Do not use; contact manufacturer; may be counterfeit or subject to recall
notes: POST form could register device serial + patient for future recall notifications

title: Contractor Bonds and Insurance
verified_action_description: Homeowner can sign contract with confidence; bond and insurance are current
not_verified_action_description: Do not pay deposit; require direct verification from bonding company
notes: Protects homeowners from unlicensed or uninsured contractors

title: Vaccine Certificates
verified_action_description: Allow entry to venue, school, or country; update immunization registry
not_verified_action_description: Ask for provider contact; verify with issuing clinic or pharmacy
notes: Fake vaccine cards were rampant during COVID; verification rebuilds trust
